comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: SafeSex on January 12, 2023, 11:49:02 AMGreat Initiative.But why i am unable to use my wallet for another transaction???By looking just at the website, I can tell that they are probably not genuine. It's likely a scam. Maybe one of those exchange or services that steal private keys or tokens from wallets once you connect your wallet and grant some permissions. Be very careful when connecting your wallets to such sites, or else everything in your wallet will be stolen.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 17, 2023, 08:44:59 PMQuote from: SafeSex on January 12, 2023, 11:49:02 AMGreat Initiative.But why i am unable to use my wallet for another transaction???By looking just at the website, I can tell that they are probably not genuine. It's likely a scam. Maybe one of those exchange or services that steal private keys or tokens from wallets once you connect your wallet and grant some permissions. Be very careful when connecting your wallets to such sites, or else everything in your wallet will be stolen.I tried to click on the link but it ask me immediately to connect my wallet which obviously I decline. I think a legit DEX doesn't work like this but it will let you look around on their site first before you decide if you will try them or not so maybe you are right that this one here is likely a scam and only wants to empty our wallet.To make the attempt more successful, they use the term free Busd. Never heard, a legit exchange which gives free coins to be honest but they only offer some discounts or coupons for the new users but anyway, if we want to interact with a new decentralized sites, its always better to prepare another disposable wallet and don't use your main wallets, just to be safe.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: lixer on January 20, 2023, 06:55:11 AMTo make the attempt more successful, they use the term free Busd. Never heard, a legit exchange which gives free coins to be honest but they only offer some discounts or coupons for the new users Yeah, this is major, targeting ignorant and greedy noobs who think the free BUSD offer is actually true. The day people will tame their greed and do extensive research before getting involved with such platforms is the day scam will reduce in the crypto industryQuote from: lixer on January 20, 2023, 06:55:11 AMits always better to prepare another disposable wallet and don't use your main wallets, just to be safe.This is very true

comments.body: Everyone here commenting here thinking themselves masters in crypto just losing a great opportunity. You need to check it once to believe it.Step by Step1) Open https://app.bnbswap.exchange2) Connet your Metamask Using Binance Smart Chain (if your metamask is in Binance Smart chain it will connect automatically) 3) Turn your 1 BNB to 352 BUSD4) Sell it on #Binance or any CEX or DEX Â Quote from: lixer on January 20, 2023, 06:55:11 AMQuote from: JeromeTash on January 17, 2023, 08:44:59 PMQuote from: SafeSex on January 12, 2023, 11:49:02 AMGreat Initiative.But why i am unable to use my wallet for another transaction???By looking just at the website, I can tell that they are probably not genuine. It's likely a scam. Maybe one of those exchange or services that steal private keys or tokens from wallets once you connect your wallet and grant some permissions. Be very careful when connecting your wallets to such sites, or else everything in your wallet will be stolen.I tried to click on the link but it ask me immediately to connect my wallet which obviously I decline. I think a legit DEX doesn't work like this but it will let you look around on their site first before you decide if you will try them or not so maybe you are right that this one here is likely a scam and only wants to empty our wallet.To make the attempt more successful, they use the term free Busd. Never heard, a legit exchange which gives free coins to be honest but they only offer some discounts or coupons for the new users but anyway, if we want to interact with a new decentralized sites, its always better to prepare another disposable wallet and don't use your main wallets, just to be safe.Thats what happens with Uniswap and pancakeswap as well. if your wallet is on ETH network it will connect automatically on uniswap. and on pancake if metamask on binance smart chain. [Moderator note: consecutive posts merged (separated via horizontal lines)]

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: bnbswapexchange on April 26, 2023, 05:22:49 PMEveryone here commenting here thinking themselves masters in crypto just losing a great opportunity. What opportunity?Quote from: bnbswapexchange on April 26, 2023, 05:31:39 PMThats what happens with Uniswap and pancakeswap as well. if your wallet is on ETH network it will connect automatically on uniswap. and on pancake if metamask on binance smart chain.You're right here, maybe they didn't notice that it was a subdomain app. link. When you go directly to the site, there is no automatic launch of Metamask or other wallets.However, now I see that your service has been in existence for several months. However, your site is still incomplete with some terrible design solutions and I would honestly say that there is a 99% probability that it is a scam.
